models.name: GPT-4.1
models.description: Most capable GPT-4 model with improved instruction following, JSON mode, reproducible outputs, parallel function calling, and more.

models.name: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
models.description: Anthropic's most powerful model, great for complex tasks, code generation, and analysis.

models.name: Claude 3 Haiku
models.description: Fastest and most affordable Claude model.

models.name: Claude Sonnet 4.6
models.description: Anthropic's most capable Sonnet-class model yet, with strong performance across coding, agents, and professional work. 1M context.

models.name: Llama 3 8B Instruct
models.description: Meta's efficient 8B parameter model for faster responses.

models.name: Moonshot Kimi K2 Thinking
models.description: Moonshot's thinking model with extended reasoning capabilities for step-by-step problem solving.

models.name: Moonshot Kimi K2.5
models.description: Moonshot's native multimodal model with state-of-the-art visual coding and agent swarm paradigm. Strong in general reasoning, visual coding, and agentic tool-calling.

models.name: Solar Pro 3 (Free)
models.description: Mixture-of-Experts model with 102B total / 12B active parameters. Optimized for Korean with English and Japanese support. Free tier.

models.name: Trinity Large Preview (Free)
models.description: 400B sparse MoE model with 13B active parameters. Excels at creative writing, chat, and agentic tasks with tool use. Free tier.
